Posts.Content: Thank you, I do have a huge circle of friends and 2 fantastic sisters and a brother ... you are right, everyone is being angry on my behalf because they don't know what else to do.  I'm sure as things progress and we have a definite plan to focus on things will get better.   How are you doing?  Where are you up to with your treatment? x
Posts.Title: Been diagnosed with breast cancer on Monday feeling a bit scared

Posts.Content: Hello, I have just had the worst news of my life too, my op was booked in for the 13th March, but cancelled due to being called in for a second biopsy, still waiting for the results of that.  I just want to have the op, and start recovering ... the waiting is the hardest bit.  I'm trying to stay cool and calm about it, but find that people are stressing me out as everyone has a friend, relative, or opinion on breast cancer.  All I need to do is chat to people who are going through the same as me ... does anyone else here get annoyed when people say 'stay strong, it'll be ok'?  How do they know?  XX
Posts.Title: Been diagnosed with breast cancer on Monday feeling a bit scared
